attributes.action: give free police cars to the police force, so that they can safely and quickly bring an end to pursuits by any means at the officers diposal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the police cannot always stop criminals in cars becuase they cannot damage their own to stop them, this leads to many criminals and suspects to escape.
my petition is in aid of the goverment supplying the police force with 50 free high performance cars a year.   the police should then use these to quickly chase down and detain the suspect before they escape by any means at their disposal.
